destinations.name: Ho Chi Minh City
destinations.description: Vietnam's largest city and economic hub, formerly known as Saigon. A vibrant metropolis blending French colonial architecture with modern skyscrapers, bustling markets, and rich history.

attractions.name: War Remnants Museum
attractions.description: Powerful museum documenting the Vietnam War through photographs, artifacts, and military equipment. Essential for understanding Vietnam's recent history.
attractions.address: 28 Vo Van Tan, District 3, Ho Chi Minh City

attractions.name: Cu Chi Tunnels
attractions.description: Extensive underground tunnel network used during the Vietnam War. Experience the ingenious tunnel system and learn about guerrilla warfare tactics.
attractions.address: Phu Hiep, Cu Chi District, Ho Chi Minh City

attractions.name: Ben Thanh Market
attractions.description: Iconic central market selling everything from food to souvenirs. Great place to experience local culture and try Vietnamese street food.
attractions.address: Le Loi, Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City

attractions.name: Notre Dame Cathedral
attractions.description: Beautiful French colonial cathedral built in the late 19th century. Iconic red brick facade and neo-Romanesque architecture.
attractions.address: 01 Cong xa Paris, Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City

attractions.name: Reunification Palace
attractions.description: Former presidential palace, now a museum showcasing 1960s architecture and Vietnamese political history.
attractions.address: 135 Nam Ky Khoi Nghia, Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City

activities.name: Mekong Delta Day Trip
activities.description: Explore the lush Mekong Delta with boat rides through narrow canals, visit floating markets, and experience rural Vietnamese life.

activities.name: Street Food Tour
activities.description: Guided tour through District 1's best street food spots. Try pho, banh mi, fresh spring rolls, and Vietnamese coffee.

activities.name: Saigon Skydeck Visit
activities.description: Panoramic views of Ho Chi Minh City from the 49th floor of Bitexco Financial Tower.

activities.name: Cooking Class
activities.description: Learn to cook traditional Vietnamese dishes including pho, spring rolls, and Vietnamese pancakes.

destinations.name: Hanoi
destinations.description: Vietnam's capital and cultural heart, featuring ancient temples, French colonial architecture, and the chaotic charm of the Old Quarter.

attractions.name: Hoan Kiem Lake
attractions.description: Peaceful lake in the heart of Hanoi, perfect for morning walks. Legend says it's home to a giant turtle.
attractions.address: Hoan Kiem District, Hanoi

attractions.name: Temple of Literature
attractions.description: Vietnam's first university, dedicated to Confucius. Beautiful traditional architecture and peaceful gardens.
attractions.address: 58 Quoc Tu Giam, Dong Da, Hanoi

attractions.name: Old Quarter
attractions.description: Historic neighborhood with narrow streets, traditional shophouses, and bustling street life. Each street specialized in different crafts.
attractions.address: Hoan Kiem District, Hanoi

attractions.name: Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum
attractions.description: Final resting place of Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam's revolutionary leader. Solemn and significant historical site.
attractions.address: 2 Hung Vuong, Dien Bien, Ba Dinh, Hanoi

activities.name: Ha Long Bay Day Trip
activities.description: UNESCO World Heritage cruise through limestone karsts and emerald waters. Includes cave exploration and seafood lunch.

activities.name: Pho Breakfast Tour
activities.description: Early morning tour to experience authentic pho bo at local street stalls where Hanoi residents start their day.

activities.name: Water Puppet Show
activities.description: Traditional Vietnamese art form performed in water. Unique cultural experience showcasing folk tales and rural life.

activities.name: Motorbike Food Tour
activities.description: Ride pillion on motorbikes to hidden food spots only locals know. Experience Hanoi's traffic and incredible street food.

destinations.name: Hoi An
destinations.description: Ancient trading port with well-preserved architecture, lantern-lit streets, and excellent tailoring. UNESCO World Heritage site.

attractions.name: Ancient Town
attractions.description: UNESCO World Heritage site with Chinese, Japanese, and European architectural influences. Beautiful lantern-lit streets.
attractions.address: Hoi An Ancient Town, Quang Nam

attractions.name: Japanese Covered Bridge
attractions.description: Iconic 18th-century bridge connecting Chinese and Japanese quarters. Symbol of Hoi An with beautiful carvings.
attractions.address: Nguyen Thi Minh Khai, Hoi An

attractions.name: An Bang Beach
attractions.description: Beautiful white sand beach just 5km from Hoi An. Less crowded than Cua Dai Beach with clear blue water.
attractions.address: An Bang, Hoi An, Quang Nam

activities.name: Lantern Making Workshop
activities.description: Learn to make traditional silk lanterns with local artisans. Take home your own handmade Hoi An lantern.

activities.name: Basket Boat Tour
activities.description: Navigate through coconut forest waterways in traditional round bamboo boats. Includes crab fishing experience.

activities.name: Tailoring Experience
activities.description: Get custom clothes made by skilled Hoi An tailors. Choose fabrics and styles for shirts, dresses, or suits.

activities.name: My Son Sanctuary Day Trip
activities.description: Visit ancient Cham ruins dating from 4th-14th centuries. UNESCO World Heritage Hindu temple complex.

destinations.name: Da Nang
destinations.description: Modern coastal city with beautiful beaches, the iconic Dragon Bridge, and gateway to Ba Na Hills and Hoi An.

attractions.name: Ba Na Hills
attractions.description: Mountain resort with French village replica, Golden Bridge held by giant hands, and cable car rides.
attractions.address: An Son Village, Hoa Ninh Commune, Hoa Vang District, Da Nang

attractions.name: Dragon Bridge
attractions.description: Modern bridge shaped like a dragon that breathes fire and water on weekend evenings. Engineering marvel.
attractions.address: Dragon Bridge, Da Nang

attractions.name: My Khe Beach
attractions.description: One of Vietnam's most beautiful beaches with white sand, clear water, and excellent seafood restaurants.
attractions.address: My Khe Beach, Da Nang

activities.name: Marble Mountains Exploration
activities.description: Climb limestone hills with caves, pagodas, and panoramic views. Named after five elements in Eastern philosophy.

activities.name: Han Market Food Tour
activities.description: Explore Da Nang's central market sampling local specialties like mi quang, banh xeo, and tropical fruits.

activities.name: Dragon Bridge Fire Show
activities.description: Watch the spectacular fire and water show from Dragon Bridge every Saturday and Sunday evening.

destinations.name: Sapa
destinations.description: Mountainous region famous for terraced rice fields, ethnic minority villages, and hiking opportunities. Cool climate escape.
destinations.best_time_to_visit: September to November, March to May

attractions.name: Muong Hoa Valley
attractions.description: Stunning valley with terraced rice fields and ethnic minority villages. Perfect for trekking and photography.
attractions.address: Muong Hoa Valley, Sapa, Lao Cai

attractions.name: Cat Cat Village
attractions.description: H'mong ethnic village showcasing traditional handicrafts, customs, and mountain lifestyle.
attractions.address: Cat Cat Village, Sapa, Lao Cai

attractions.name: Fansipan Mountain
attractions.description: Highest peak in Indochina at 3,143m. Accessible by cable car or challenging multi-day trek.
attractions.address: Hoang Lien National Park, Sapa, Lao Cai

activities.name: Rice Terrace Trekking
activities.description: Multi-day trek through terraced rice fields visiting ethnic villages and experiencing mountain life.

activities.name: Homestay Experience
activities.description: Stay with local ethnic families to experience authentic mountain culture, food, and traditional lifestyle.

activities.name: Love Waterfall Hike
activities.description: Hike through forest to reach beautiful multi-tiered waterfall. Refreshing swimming opportunity.

destinations.name: Nha Trang
destinations.description: Popular beach destination with beautiful bays, offshore islands, mud baths, and vibrant nightlife.

attractions.name: Nha Trang Beach
attractions.description: 6km stretch of golden sand beach with clear blue water, perfect for swimming and water sports.
attractions.address: Nha Trang Beach, Khanh Hoa

attractions.name: Po Nagar Cham Towers
attractions.description: Ancient Cham temple complex dating from 7th-12th centuries. Important Hindu religious site.
attractions.address: 2 Thang 4, Vinh Phuoc, Nha Trang

attractions.name: Vinpearl Island
attractions.description: Resort island with amusement park, aquarium, and beautiful beaches. Accessible by cable car.
attractions.address: Vinpearl Island, Nha Trang Bay

activities.name: Island Hopping Tour
activities.description: Visit nearby islands including Hon Mun, Hon Mot, and Hon Tam. Snorkeling and beach time included.

activities.name: Mud Bath Experience
activities.description: Relax in natural mineral mud baths and hot springs. Therapeutic and rejuvenating experience.

activities.name: Scuba Diving
activities.description: Explore underwater coral reefs and marine life around Nha Trang Bay. Various dive sites available.

destinations.name: Da Lat
destinations.description: Cool mountain city known as the 'City of Eternal Spring' with French colonial charm, flower gardens, and coffee plantations.

attractions.name: Crazy House
attractions.description: Bizarre architectural attraction designed like a fairy tale tree house with winding paths and organic shapes.
attractions.address: 03 Huynh Thuc Khang, Ward 4, Da Lat

attractions.name: Datanla Falls
attractions.description: Beautiful waterfall accessible by alpine coaster ride through forest. Adventure and nature combined.
attractions.address: Datanla Falls, Dalat, Lam Dong

attractions.name: Da Lat Market
attractions.description: Colorful market selling fresh flowers, strawberries, coffee, and local handicrafts. Cool mountain produce.
attractions.address: Central Market, Da Lat, Lam Dong

activities.name: Coffee Plantation Tour
activities.description: Visit coffee farms to learn about cultivation, processing, and taste high-quality Vietnamese coffee varieties.

activities.name: Valley of Love Visit
activities.description: Romantic lake surrounded by pine forests and flower gardens. Popular for couples and photography.

activities.name: Canyoning Adventure
activities.description: Rappel down waterfalls and navigate through mountain streams. Thrilling outdoor adventure.
